meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>visit</kanji> <kanji>problem</kanji> is when someone makes <vocabulary>a visit</vocabulary>, because you're the type of person who doesn't like visitors, since they're usually so inconsiderate and you have to feed them. That's why <vocabulary>a visit</vocabulary> is a visit problem.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
